page.title: 10INDUSTRY - NEW TECHNOLOGY
page.content: F.G.H.S. The Welding and Engineering Contractors. The most recent industrial venture. They took over a disused garage in 1984, since then the business has flourished. It now employs 22 tradesmen; Engineers, Welders, Machinists, Coppersmiths, Pipefitters etc. They are now taking on apprentices. They specialise in making profiles, Fabrication, Design and Installation of pipework systems, also maintenance contracts for local Industries. They do some oil related work with markets local and national.
